properties.name: p_gen_0
properties.svad: The property holds.

properties.name: p_gen_1
properties.svad: When the busy signal occurs between 1 and 2 times with goto, then between 2 and 4 cycles later, the valid signal, then in the next cycle, the ready signal holds continuously while the busy signal and the ready signal, the data enable (data_en) signal must occur in the next cycle.

properties.name: p_gen_2
properties.svad: When the valid signal, the busy signal must occur in the same cycle.

properties.name: p_gen_3
properties.svad: When the acknowledge (ack) signal, the ready signal must occur in the next cycle.

properties.name: p_gen_4
properties.svad: The grant (gnt) signal until the ready signal, then between 2 and 3 cycles later, the valid signal.

properties.name: p_gen_5
properties.sva: first_match((data_en throughout data_en)) |-> ((req ##[1:2] (valid ##[0:1] valid)) and req)
properties.svad: When the first match of the data enable (data_en) signal holds continuously while the data enable (data_en) signal, the request (req) signal, then between 1 and 2 cycles later, the valid signal, then between 0 and 1 cycles later, the valid signal and the request (req) signal must occur in the same cycle.

properties.name: p_gen_6
properties.svad: When the request (req) signal holds continuously while the request (req) signal, the data enable (data_en) signal must occur in the same cycle.

properties.name: p_gen_7
properties.svad: When the request (req) signal, then between 0 and 3 cycles later, the acknowledge (ack) signal occurs between 4 and 6 times non-consecutively occurs between 2 and 5 times consecutively, the request (req) signal must occur in the same cycle.

properties.name: p_gen_8
properties.svad: (the grant (gnt) signal and the first match of the data enable (data_en) signal occurs between 5 and 6 times non-consecutively occurs between 3 and 6 times with goto).

properties.name: p_gen_9
properties.svad: When the first match of the first match of the request (req) signal, then between 0 and 1 cycles later, the acknowledge (ack) signal, the ready signal occurs between 4 and 7 times consecutively occurs between 2 and 4 times non-consecutively, then between 2 and 3 cycles later, the acknowledge (ack) signal must occur in the next cycle.

properties.name: p_gen_10
properties.svad: (the data enable (data_en) signal or the grant (gnt) signal).

properties.name: p_gen_11
properties.svad: When the acknowledge (ack) signal, the valid signal must occur in the next cycle.

properties.name: p_gen_12
properties.svad: When the ready signal occurs at least 2 times with goto or the acknowledge (ack) signal occurs between 3 and 5 times non-consecutively occurs at least 1 times non-consecutively, the request (req) signal must occur in the same cycle.

properties.name: p_gen_13
properties.svad: The busy signal, then between 2 and 4 cycles later, the busy signal occurs between 3 and 6 times non-consecutively until and including the request (req) signal.

properties.name: p_gen_14
properties.svad: The data enable (data_en) signal until the valid signal intersects with the first match of the data enable (data_en) signal occurs between 5 and 7 times non-consecutively (disabled when the valid signal).

properties.name: p_gen_15
properties.svad: When the request (req) signal intersects with the ready signal intersects with the ready signal, the request (req) signal must occur in the next cycle.

properties.name: p_gen_16
properties.svad: (the ready signal and the request (req) signal occurs between 2 and 5 times with goto).

properties.name: p_gen_17
properties.svad: When the busy signal, the grant (gnt) signal must occur in the next cycle.

properties.name: p_gen_18
properties.svad: When the busy signal occurs at least 2 times consecutively, then in the next cycle, the grant (gnt) signal or the acknowledge (ack) signal, the data enable (data_en) signal occurs 5 times non-consecutively must occur in the same cycle.

properties.name: p_gen_19
properties.svad: (the valid signal occurs 3 times consecutively, then between 0 and 1 cycles later, the data enable (data_en) signal, then in the next cycle, the busy signal, then immediately, the grant (gnt) signal occurs at least 2 times consecutively or the grant (gnt) signal).
